title: The Series 7 Apple Watch drops to just $155
description: Macworld If you’ve been holding out on buying an Apple Watch, this is your moment. For a limited time, you can score a refurbished Apple Watch Series 7 for just $154.99 (reg. $499). This model delivers everything you need in a smartwatch: a larger, always-on Retina display, full QWERTY keyboard, ECG and blood oxygen sensors, and an all-day battery with 33% faster charging. It’s wrapped in a durable aluminum case with crack-resistant glass, dust protection, and water resistance—so it can handle workouts, spills, and everyday wear without flinching. Need to respond to messages, track your heart rate, or just skip songs while you’re on the move? The Series 7 makes it simple, smooth, and stylish. You’ll also get watchOS 8, which introduces smarter UI, new faces, and updated fitness tools. This is a Grade B refurbished model, so expect a few minor scuffs—but nothing that’ll get in the way of performance. For this lower price, you’re getting one of Apple’s smartest wearables without the usual price tag. Get this refurbished Apple Watch Series 7 while it’s $154.99 (reg. $499).
